summary: My own version of Rhaegar, with proper armor and sword
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#5B0F00][size=5][b]RHAEGAR TARGARYEN[/b][/size][/color][color=#5B0F00][b][size=5] Game of Thrones FOLLOWER[/size][/b][/color]
[b][size=5]

[/size][size=5][size=3][color=#000000]Rhaegar is now a STANDALONE FOLLOWER which means no other mods will be required.
HIGLY RACCOMANDED: WIC CLOAKS by Nivea here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13486/?
(i have no permission to use in mod..)
Textures: SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and
Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
Default Weapon : Raegar Sword.
Location : Solitude Inn
Combat Style : Warrior 1H
[/color][size=2][size=3][color=#000000]..and is unkillable
[/color][size=5][b][size=3][size=4][color=#000000]AS ALWAYS..REPORT ME ANY ISSUE..THANK YOU!
HIGHLY RACCOMANDED - Face Light by [b]tktk[/b] here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?[/color]
[size=3][color=#5B0F00][Credit][/color]
[size=2][size=3]
